item.title: Simple to win for Liberal Party - focus on older voters!
item.description: Abstract This project focused on the relationship between the ages of voters and voting percentages of Liberal Party using 2019 Canadian Election Study data. Based on the finding of the project, the results show that the voting percentages of Liberal Party is roughly decreasing with increasing of ages of voters. Thus, this project suggests Liberal Party should focus on obtain more votes from older people to win the election.

item.title: About Hugo XMag
item.description: XMag is the second Hugo theme I have designed. It is based on my first Hugo theme XMin, and similarly, features minimalism but with a magazine style on the homepage inspired by The Signpost on Wikipedia. You can find its source code on Github: https://github.com/yihui/hugo-xmag (licensed under MIT). Features This theme includes a few cool features: Responsive article summary blocks on homepage Thumbnails in summary blocks
